Listen to Our Music

Zandza Berg

ZandZa Berg is the name of DJ Rosângela Berg's psytrance project.
With over 15 years of career in the electronic scene, she puts all her energy and experience building her sets, guiding the dancefloor through a psychedelic journey inside Full On, moving between the great old school classics and newer sounds. Also has as a differential her refined DJing technique, which makes the dancefloor surrender itself to the dance.
In her extensive career as a DJ, she collects performances in major clubs and events across Brazil, such as Universo Paralello, Club A, Sacarose, Ultra Trance and 28hs. She has also shared stage with national and international reference artists such as Vini Vici, Astrix, Stryker, Ranji, Altruism, Reality Test, and many others.

Music

ZandZa Berg · ZandZa Berg - Life´s Answer
